title: Augusta County: D. V. Gilkeson to Gilkeson's brother (probably Hugh Gilkeson), December 26, 1864
summary: Gilkeson tells his brother of their father's death, recounting his last days. He also speaks of the war and the "dark," "gloomy" times for the Confederacy.
keywords: Death/Casualties, Family, Home Front, Medicine/Hospitals, Patriotism, American Civil War
